name: PostWyse
summary: AI-powered content and social media management platform that combines SEO research, content creation, and social distribution in one workflow. Helps GTM teams go from keyword research to published, optimized content across search and social channels.
gtm_use_cases: Research high-intent keywords and generate SEO-optimized content briefs for GTM campaigns
Create and schedule AI-assisted social media posts that amplify SEO content across channels
Analyze content performance across search and social to identify top pipeline-driving topics

name: Semrush
summary: SEO and competitive intelligence platform with strong advertising, social media, and content marketing modules. Its Keyword Magic Tool and Position Tracking are core for GTM keyword strategies.
gtm_use_cases: Build keyword universes segmented by funnel stage (TOFU, MOFU, BOFU)
Run competitor domain analysis to benchmark share-of-search
Track branded vs. non-branded keyword visibility over time

name: Google Search Console
summary: Free, first-party search performance data from Google. Essential for understanding which queries drive clicks, identifying indexation issues, and measuring Core Web Vitals.
gtm_use_cases: Discover which search queries drive the most qualified traffic to key landing pages
Identify pages losing impressions that need content refreshes
Validate that new programmatic pages are indexed correctly

name: Screaming Frog SEO Spider
summary: Desktop site crawler that surfaces indexability issues, broken links, redirect chains, and duplicate content. Free tier crawls up to 500 URLs, making it practical for early-stage technical audits.
gtm_use_cases: Audit technical SEO health before a site relaunch or migration
Identify crawl-budget waste on large programmatic content sites
Generate XML sitemaps for new page sets

name: Surfer SEO
summary: On-page optimization tool that uses SERP analysis to provide data-driven content guidelines. Its Content Editor scores pages in real time against top-ranking competitors.
gtm_use_cases: Optimize existing blog posts to improve rankings for high-intent commercial queries
Create content briefs with target word counts, headings, and NLP terms
Scale content quality checks across a team of writers or AI drafts

name: Clearscope
summary: Content optimization platform that grades content against search intent signals. Helps GTM content teams produce pages that rank without over-relying on guesswork.
gtm_use_cases: Grade and improve bottom-of-funnel comparison and alternative pages
Standardize content quality across in-house writers and freelancers
Track content grades over time as SERPs evolve

name: Google Trends
summary: Free tool showing search interest over time for any query. Useful for GTM teams to validate market timing, compare category terms, and spot seasonal patterns.
gtm_use_cases: Validate whether a new product category has rising search demand
Compare branded search volume against competitors as a GTM health metric
Plan content calendar around seasonal search spikes

name: PageSpeed Insights
summary: Free Google tool that measures Core Web Vitals and page performance. GTM teams use it to ensure landing pages meet performance thresholds that affect both rankings and conversion rates.
gtm_use_cases: Diagnose slow landing pages that hurt both SEO and paid campaign quality scores
Benchmark page speed before and after site updates
Prioritize performance fixes by revenue impact of affected pages

name: Schema.org Markup Validator
summary: Validates structured data markup against Schema.org specifications. Proper schema implementation drives rich results that improve CTR from search.
gtm_use_cases: Validate FAQ, HowTo, and Product schema on key landing pages
Ensure review and pricing schema renders correctly for commercial pages
Debug structured data errors flagged by Google Search Console

name: Keyword Insights
summary: AI-powered keyword clustering and search intent classification tool. Groups thousands of keywords into topical clusters and identifies whether Google expects informational, commercial, or transactional content.
gtm_use_cases: Cluster keyword lists into content hub topics aligned to product categories
Classify search intent at scale to map keywords to funnel stages
Identify cannibalization opportunities where multiple pages target the same cluster

name: Sitebulb
summary: Website auditing tool with visual crawl maps and prioritized issue lists. Its hint system explains the SEO impact of each issue, making it accessible to non-technical GTM stakeholders.
gtm_use_cases: Generate visual site architecture reports for GTM planning sessions
Prioritize technical SEO fixes by estimated traffic impact
Audit internal linking structure to improve link equity flow to money pages

name: AlsoAsked
summary: Scrapes People Also Ask data from Google and maps it as a tree. Useful for content ideation and understanding the question landscape around a topic.
gtm_use_cases: Map the full question graph around a product category for FAQ and content planning
Identify long-tail informational queries that feed top-of-funnel traffic
Structure content hub architectures based on real user questions

name: Moz Pro
summary: SEO toolset known for Domain Authority metric, keyword tracking, and on-page optimization. Its Link Explorer helps GTM teams assess the competitive landscape.
gtm_use_cases: Track Domain Authority growth as a long-term brand investment metric
Identify link-building opportunities to high-authority sites in the target market
Audit on-page optimization factors for conversion-critical pages

name: Screaming Frog Log File Analyser
summary: Analyzes server log files to reveal how search engine bots actually crawl a site. Critical for large or programmatic sites where crawl efficiency directly impacts indexation.
gtm_use_cases: Verify that Googlebot is reaching and recrawling high-value landing pages
Identify pages receiving zero bot visits that are effectively invisible to search
Optimize crawl budget allocation for sites with large programmatic page sets

name: BrightEdge
summary: Enterprise SEO platform with AI-powered recommendations, real-time research, and content performance tracking. Built for large organizations managing SEO at scale across multiple domains and regions.
gtm_use_cases: Manage SEO visibility across multiple product lines and regional domains
Generate automated SEO recommendations tied to revenue impact
Report on organic search contribution to pipeline for executive stakeholders
